_header: See here my master Carpenter I you pray
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, ‘Balade to my maister Carpenter’ — four stanzas rhyme royal

HunHM111.First Lines:
See heer my maister Carpenter I yow preyeHow many chalenges ageyn
                    me be…
HunHM111.Last Lines:
…How wel þat yee doon & how soone alsoI suffre may in
                    qwenchynge of my wo
HunHM111.Note: Four stanzas rhyme royal in this MS.
HunHM111.Attributed Title:
A de B & C de D &c. Ceste balade feust tendrement consideree
                        & bonement execute (f. 41)
